main event: A civilian in Norwood, Ohio reported seeing a red light that disappeared behind trees on May 9, 1966 at 11:00 PM.
interesting points: The observer stated the speed of the UFO would compare with a lighted aircraft.
The object was observed for a total duration of 2 hours and 25 seconds.
The observer used an elapsed time clock to determine the duration of the sighting.
The object appeared as a solid, bright red light that was brighter than the North Star.
The observer was a calm, experienced pilot and observer with the Civil Air Patrol.
